text.title: Social Charity Network Analysis
text.more:
The CIA unit is currently investigating an illegal gambling group during the recent FIFA 2014 World Cup. 
As the data analyst of the unit, you are provided with a list of mobile phone call records that cover a ten-day period in 3-12 June 2014.
It consists of about 400 unique mobile phone records during this period. The records should provide critical information about the social network structure of the illegal gambling company called Social Charity.
The group is led by a leader with a nickname Ghost. 

This diagram is used to characterise the social network structure, focusing on 
(i) characterising the social structure of Social Charity/Ghost as reflected in the calling data
(ii) identifying any changes in the social structure over the ten-days period.
